Title: Proposes an amendment to the constitution providing that certain unfunded mandate shall cease to be mandatory in effect and shall become voluntary in operation
Summary: Proposes an amendment to the constitution providing that certain unfunded mandate shall cease to be mandatory in effect and shall become voluntary in operations; requires the legislature to establish by law a council on local mandates.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing amendments to article 9 of the constitution, in relation to prohibiting unfunded mandates
